heading: Armory Temporarily Disabled – February 4, 2025 – 2.1.1
content: Season 7: Season of Witchcraft has been here for some time already and while the is making sure everything stays on point, Blizzard keeps taking care of us and giving us updates on the state of the game: Due to some infortunate bugs, Filthierich just announced the Armory will be temporarily disabled. The issue will be resolved as soon as possible. We will keep you updated on Maxroll! We hope you enjoy the Season of Witchcraft with the aid of our Season 7 updates. Our focus for the start of Season 7 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes. We're continuing to work on more updates for If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
